
```{r}
#Risk taking scores
helmet <- bicycle %>%
  filter(Condition ==1)

hat <- bicycle %>%
  filter(Condition == 2)

#BART
mean(helmet$BART)
sd(helmet$BART)

mean(hat$BART)  
sd(hat$BART)

#independent t test (not Welch's)
t.test(helmet$BART, hat$BART, var.equal = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#SSS
mean(helmet$SSS_total)
sd(helmet$SSS_total)

mean(hat$SSS_total)
sd(hat$SSS_total)

#independent t test
t.test(helmet$SSS_total, hat$SSS_total)
```
